job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering task of building and maintaining scalable and reliable platforms and services.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business/domain needs (cybersecurity) and translating them into technical solutions, a key aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the integration aspect of software engineering, working with other teams to build complete solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers
job_tasks.justification: These are all standard software engineering practices related to code quality, team development, and mentorship.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions leveraging AI models and algorithms to drive a transformation, which falls under the development or application of models.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates working with experts to understand needs and translate them, which requires strong communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with other engineering teams.
Mentoring junior engineers is a clear indicator of communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in strategic planning related to the business domain (cybersecurity).

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on software engineering tasks (designing, developing, scaling platforms and services, code quality, collaboration) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions leveraging AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense, the core responsibility is building the platform and integrating these AI capabilities, rather than deep model development or specialization in GenAI techniques like prompt engineering or RAG. The role is about building an AI-powered security platform, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly emphasizes software engineering tasks and the integration of AI into a security platform. The mention of AI is present but not the sole focus, and specific GenAI techniques are not detailed. The profile assignment is strongly supported by the text, but a slightly higher score could be achieved with more explicit details on the AI models or techniques used.
